15 template <class BaseClass>
16 class TComponentCloneWrap: virtual public BaseClass, protected CInterfaceManipBase
17 {
18 public:
19  // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)
20  virtual istd::IChangeable* CloneMe(istd::IChangeable::CompatibilityMode mode = BaseClass::CM_WITHOUT_REFS) const;
21 };
22 
23 
24 // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)
25 
26 template <class BaseClass>
27 istd::IChangeable* TComponentCloneWrap<BaseClass>::CloneMe(istd::IChangeable::CompatibilityMode mode) const
28 {
29  const CComponentContext* contextPtr = dynamic_cast<const CComponentContext*>(BaseClass::GetComponentContext());
30  if (contextPtr != NULL){
31  const ICompositeComponent* parentComponentPtr = BaseClass::GetParentComponent();
32  if (parentComponentPtr != NULL){
33  istd::TDelPtr<istd::IChangeable> clonedPtr;
34 
35  clonedPtr.SetCastedOrRemove(ExtractInterface<istd::IChangeable>(parentComponentPtr->CreateSubcomponent(contextPtr->GetContextId())));
36 
37  if (clonedPtr.IsValid()){
38  if (clonedPtr->CopyFrom(*this, mode)){
39  return clonedPtr.PopPtr();
40  }
41  }
42  }
43  }
44 
45  return NULL;
46 }
47

49 } // namespace icomp

52 #endif
